analyzed: vajrayoginyāḥ stuti praṇidhānam
om namaḥ śrī vajrayoginyai
namaḥ buddha dharma saṃghebhyaḥ
namaḥ guru buddha bodhisattvebhyaḥ
namaḥ locana ādi daśa vajravilāsinībhyaḥ
namaḥ yama antaka ādi daśa krodha vīrebhyaḥ sa prajñebhyaḥ

original: om o ā hūṃ iti kāyavākacita indriyavijñānāni,
analyzed: om o ā hūm iti kāyavāka citaḥ indriya vijñānāni
vāka cittāni manaḥ vijñānāni
parakāyapraveśa abhijñā puṇḍarīkeṣu nābhi sthe rakta sūrya maṇḍalaḥ
tri śṛṅgā hi tri koṇā vā catur pīṭha samanvitā
hrīṃkāram pīta varṇaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
tad bhavā pīta varṇā ca avadhūtyā
svayam sthitā

original: lalanāyāṃ tu suśyāmā rasanāyāṃ ca gaurikā |
analyzed: lalanāyām tu suśyāmā rasanāyām ca gaurikā
pratyālīḍhapadā nāmnā madhye pītā manoramā
tri mārge saṃsthitā devī tri kāya vajra yoginī
sā iyam nāmnā bhavet ekā sarva sambuddha ḍākinī
trailokye divya rūpā ca sarva āśā paripūrikā
sva kartinā kartitam ca vāma haste sva mastakam
dakṣiṇā isyā sthitā kartiḥ jagataḥ duḥkha chedinī

original: asyā vāme sthitā śyāmā nāmnā sā varavarṇinī || 7 ||
analyzed: asyāḥ vāme sthitā śyāmā nāmnā sā varavarṇinī

original: karparaḥ savyahaste ca kartirvāme ca saṃsthitā |
analyzed: karparaḥ savya haste ca kartiḥ vāme ca saṃsthitā

original: dakṣiṇe caiva pītā vai vajravairocanī sthitā || 8 ||
analyzed: dakṣiṇe ca eva pītā vai vajra vairocanī sthitā
kartikā dakṣiṇe haste vāme kapāla dhāriṇī
pratyālīḍha padā devī nagnikā tu viśeṣataḥ

original: karau ca dvau tayoḥ pādau viparītau tathā sthitau |
analyzed: karau ca dvau tayoḥ pādau viparītau tathā sthitau
buddhānām jananī madhyā samyaksambuddha rūpiṇī

original: akṣayā subhagā nityaṃ hantrī ca mṛtyujanmanoḥ |
analyzed: akṣayā subhagā nityam hantrī ca mṛtyu janmanoḥ
sā iyam tribhuvane devī rājaye candra vat sadā
kabandhāt avadhūtyāḥ ca praviśet sva mukheṣu asṛk
lalanā rasanābhyām ca niḥsṛtya śirasi tathā
karūṇa arakta rūpeṇa pibantī sarva śāntaye
duḥkham saṃprekṣya lokānām catur māra niṣūdinī

original: daurmanasyādi kartyā ca kartantī sarvameva tat || 14 ||
analyzed: daurmanasya ādi kartyā ca kartantī sarvam eva tat
stutā hi jina mātar tvam su prasīda bhava arṇave

original: svārthaṃ kartuṃ parārthaṃ ca bhavāmyahaṃ yathā kṣamaḥ || 15 ||
analyzed: sva artham kartum para artham ca bhavāmi aham yathā kṣamaḥ
tat tvayā devī kartavyam anugraham mayi sṛja
ca kāya vāka citta doṣataḥ

original: gurubhaktiṃ na jāne'haṃ tvadbhaktiṃ ca viśeṣataḥ |
analyzed: guru bhaktim na jāna iham tvad bhaktim ca viśeṣataḥ
iti ākalaya lokeśi kṛpā mayi vidhīyatām

original: kāyavākacetasāṃ sāmyaṃ kuru me tvaṃ prasādataḥ |
analyzed: kāya vāka cetasām sāmyam kuru me tvam prasādataḥ

original: yena muñcāmi saṃsāraṃ ṣaḍgatiṃ na viśāmyaham || 18 ||
analyzed: yena muñcāmi saṃsāram ṣaṣ gatim na viśāmi aham
yathā ca vajra vat dehaḥ yāvat muktaḥ bhavāmi aham

original: māraiḥ sarvaiḥ parityakto yathā kāyo bhavenmama || 19 ||
analyzed: māraiḥ sarvaiḥ parityaktaḥ yathā kāyaḥ bhavet mama  /
līlayā siddhi bhāgāḥ syuḥ nirvighnaḥ sarva siddhi bhāj
syāt kāyaḥ ca eva ajara amaraḥ
trāsanam sarva mārāṇām sarva āśā paripūraṇam

original: dehi me tvaṃ varāṃ siddhiṃ hitvā caiva gamāgamam || 21 ||
analyzed: dehi me tvam varām siddhim hitvā ca eva gama āgamam
manaḥ vilīyatām devi pañca indriya anusaṃyutam
siddhyet ca vajra sattva āyuḥ yauvana ārogya sat sukham
tvad prasādāt mahāmudrā sarveṣām eva saṃbhavet
deva asura manuṣyāḥ ca yatra yatra ca saṃsthitāḥ
sukhinaḥ te ca sarve syuḥ buddhatva phala lābhinaḥ
śrī guhyasamayatantre trikāyavajrayoginyāḥ stuti praṇidhānam samāptam
kṛtiḥ iyam siddha ācārya śrī virūpa ādānām
